title: How to Cancel Your Citi Card and Remove It from Your Profile

steps.title: Call 1-800-950-5114.
steps.content: Call 1-800-950-5114 . Explain that you want to unlink a card and the customer support will help you even if the Unlink button is missing from your account online.

steps.title: Chat online.
steps.content: Chat online. Using a web browser instead of the app, chat with customer support, and explain that you want to remove a card from your account. They will help you unlink that card even if the Unlink button is missing!

steps.title: CitiManager.
steps.content: CitiManager. The Unlink button may or may not be available, so this isn't always a reliable way to remove a card from your Citibank account. To do this, click your profile picture, select Link/Unlink Card Account > Unlink , then fill in the required information and click Continue . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Here are some reasons for you to unlink a credit card:
steps.content: Here are some reasons for you to unlink a credit card: Closed account - getting rid of cards that you don't use is a good way to avoid confusion later. Security concerns - unlinking your account adds another layer of security back to your credit card. Simplifying your finances - having lots of cards attached to a single account can get overwhelming, cluttered, and confusing; unlinking cards lets you organize your connected accounts.

steps.title: You can close your account by chatting online or calling customer support.
steps.content: You can close your account by chatting online or calling customer support. If you're online, you can log into your account to initiate a chat with customer support; if you're calling customer support, you'll need the account number for the card you want to close.
